definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: My lips are cold because I can't kiss you.
sentences.chinese: 我的嘴脣泠泠的因爲我不能親吻你。

sentences.english: My lips are cold because I can't kiss you.
sentences.chinese: 我的嘴脣泠泠的因爲我不能親吻你。

sentences.english: Most people get sick because of the cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 由於天氣泠大多數人得了病。

sentences.english: Why do innocent animals always be killed by fish-blooded human?
sentences.chinese: 動物何罪，爲何遭受一些泠血人類殺害。

sentences.english: The statue's name derives from the Ling Shang area, where the Buddha is situated.
sentences.chinese: 雕像的名字來源於泠煞嗯區，那裏的佛像坐落在這裏。

sentences.english: Is it cold or warm in aturmn?
sentences.chinese: 秋季的天氣是泠還是暖呢？

sentences.english: Ling Ling puzzle night, cold smoke and months, horizontal, slanting windows.
sentences.chinese: 泠泠砌夜，冷煙和月，疏影橫窗。

sentences.english: Ling Ling puzzle night, cold smoke and months, horizontal, slanting windows.
sentences.chinese: 泠泠砌夜，冷煙和月，疏影橫窗。

sentences.english: Beaded drops of sweat stood upon my forehead.
sentences.chinese: 我額頭上的泠汗直往下冒。

sentences.english: It was very cold, so that the river froze.
sentences.chinese: 天氣很泠，因此河水結冰了。

definition: angelica (type of iris)/plant root used in TCM

homophone group (group of homophone characters, in a rhyme book)
